    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
On a vibrant evening in the Serie A calendar, the iconic San Siro was set alight as fierce city rivals AC Milan and Inter Milan went head-to-head in a match that ended in a dramatic 2-2 draw. The tension was palpable right from the outset when AC Milan kicked off the game.

Within moments of kickoff, AC Milan saw the ball go out of play, leading to Inter's first throw-in at the 20-second mark. The game was brimming with intensity; fouls and throw-ins were exchanged frequently, a testament to the fierce competitiveness between the two sides. Inter established an early presence but were penalized for a foul within less than a minute after their first throw-in.

AC Milan capitalized on the free-kick, but the game remained evenly contested with both sides struggling for control. By the 9th minute, Inter made their first serious threat at goal, albeit ending with a shot off target. The defensive units of both teams were relentless, leading to multiple clearances and throw-ins exchanged back and forth.

The first yellow card of the match was issued to an Inter player around the 19th minute, heightening the tension. Despite several more fouls, fouls by AC Milan and a yellow card awarded to one of their players kept the play on edge. Inter faced significant offensive pressure but were mostly unable to convert it into fruitful opportunities early on as their shots consistently went off-target, thus failing to trouble Milan’s goalkeeper.

By the 27th minute, the pattern of fouls and free-kicks continued as both sides attempted to break the deadlock. Inter's pinpoint pressure did not let up, frequently pushing forward only to be thwarted by Milan's meticulous defense and the occasional off-target shot. A substitution by Inter in the 36th minute appeared to be an attempt to inject some fresh energy and tactical shift.

The breakthrough finally came in the 42nd minute when Milan, after several thwarted efforts, managed to put the ball behind Inter’s goalkeeper. A beautiful sequence of play saw Milan triumphantly net the ball after two consecutive on-target shots. This crucial moment elevated the home crowd’s excitement, as Milan went into halftime with a slender 1-0 lead.

The second half commenced with Inter kicking off and immediately pushing for an equalizer. They came out with renewed aggression and purpose, leading to quick exchanges and fouls. An early opportunity presented itself for Inter through a corner kick, only for them to be capitalized quickly. By the 7th minute of the second half, the persistence paid off: Inter seized a fantastic opportunity and scored via a superb shot on target. The game was leveled at 1-1, and the fierce rivalry was reignited.

Not to be outdone, Milan attacked vigorously right from the restart, and it paid off shortly after. Inter’s defense wasn't swift enough to stanch the tide of Milan’s attacking prowess. The ball was promptly sent into Inter’s net, and in the 13th minute, Milan was back in the lead, 2-1.

The intense physical nature of the game resulted in numerous fouls, indirect free-kicks, and offside calls for both teams. The second substitution by Inter in the 29th minute aimed to rejuvenate their tired legs and tactical setup.

Inter’s hopes of salvaging a result from this clash seemed increasingly bleak until the dramatic dying embers of the match. A nail-biting finish saw Inter pushing forward with almost reckless abandon. In the 46th minute, a crucial corner led to an inter goal which leveled the score yet again at 2-2. The resilient attack paid off, and Inter celebrated amid roaring approval from their fans.

The final moments of the match saw both sides vying desperately for the winning goal. For Milan, who had briefly held the lead twice, the result might have felt like a squandered opportunity. Inter, on the other hand, showed tenacity and belief, clawing their way back into the contest twice. The closing stages were marred by yet another yellow card for Inter, emphasizing the aggression on display throughout the game.

In conclusion, the Milan derby lived up to its billing as both teams delivered a captivating performance rich with drama, intensity, and skill. The arch-rivals each displayed admirable resolve, battling fiercely for every ball, every foul, and every opportunity to break the deadlock. AC Milan might rue missed opportunities and defensive lapses, allowing Inter to equalize late in the game while Inter can take heart from their never-say-die spirit that earned them a vital away point. This 2-2 draw will be remembered as an enthralling chapter in the storied rivalry of the Milanese giants.
